snippet: Gov. Bobby Jindal’s executive order to protect people who oppose same-sex marriage is unconstitutional and should be thrown out, gay rights advocates said in a lawsuit filed Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Bobby Jindal’s executive order to protect people who oppose same-sex marriage is unconstitutional and should be thrown out, gay rights advocates said in a lawsuit filed Tuesday.

headline.main: Louisiana: Lawsuit Takes Aim at Executive Order on Marriage
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Lawsuit Takes Aim at Executive Order On Marriage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
